CustomField.description: Use Inherit Survey Option to use survey level setting for the similar design option. Use Question-Inline to horizontally align the question and response fields. Use Question-Stacked to place the question above the response fields. For the best experience, the system may override certain layout options when a user takes a survey on a tablet or mobile device.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Question-Inline - to horizontally align the question and response fields. Question-Stacked - to place the question above the response field. For the best user experience, layout maybe automatically adjusted on a tablet or mobile device.
CustomField.label: Question Variant
